properties.name: looter.batch.chunksize
properties.description: Chunk size used for batch processing in the Looter application

properties.description: Connection URL for the staging database

properties.description: Username for connecting to the staging database

properties.description: Password for connecting to the staging database

properties.description: JDBC driver class name for connecting to the staging database

properties.description: Protocol used for IRIS API (http or https)

properties.description: API key for TCGPlayer authentication

properties.description: Protocol used for TCGPlayer API (http or https)

properties.description: Pagination endpoint format for TCGPlayer cards API

properties.description: Pagination endpoint format for TCGPlayer card prices API
